name: phenotype
description: The collection of data elements related to a donor's phenotypes. To submit multiple phenotypes for a single donor, submit multiple rows in the phenotype file for this donor.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider

fields.name: submitter_phenotype_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the phenotype, assigned by the data provider

fields.name: phenotype_source_text
fields.description: Phenotype (or abnormality) as reported in the study's dataset

meta.notes: Provide exact information as per the dataset

fields.name: phenotype_HPO_code
fields.description: Code used for the phenotype in the Human Phenotype Ontology terminology

meta.notes: Write the exact code used in the HPO, for instance: HP:0001161. Please refer to the Human Phenotype Ontology at https://hpo.jax.org/app/ for code identification.

fields.name: age_at_phenotype
fields.description: Age (in days) of partipant when phenotype was observed

fields.name: phenotype_severity
fields.description: Indicate the intensity or the degree of a manifestation

fields.name: phenotype_observed
fields.description: Indicate if the phenotype is observed
